## MapControls.create() method

Creates MapControls object and attaches it specified \[\[MapView\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(mapView: MapView): MapControls;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | \[\[MapView\]\] object to which MapControls should be attached to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[MapControls](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.md)
